name: Curse Terrain
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Horror Adventures © 2016, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (the heart of a creature that dwelled in the area and powdered onyx worth 700 gp)
area: 1-mile radius emanating from the touched point
text: By touching the ground, you curse the land with four unnatural hazards. This functions as lesser curse terrain, but with the effects of the major perilous demesne curse.
castingTime_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一颗居住在此地区生物的心脏，以及价值700gp的玛瑙粉末)
area_zh: 从接触的点向外弥漫半径1哩
text_zh: 透过触摸大地，你令四个超自然危机诅咒这片土地。此法术如同次级诅咒地形(lesser curse terrain)般作用，但效果是中等危险地域诅咒(见Page.145)。
